function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Enforced curfews may lead to non-compliance and subsequent increase in gatherings during non-curfew hours, leading to higher transmission of contagious disease.","Impact":"Increased transmission and spread of contagious diseases, leading to higher infection rates.","Mitigation":"Effective communication, social support, and enforcement of measures to discourage gatherings and non-compliance during non-curfew hours.","Technologies":"Communication platforms, social media, surveillance and tracking technologies for compliance monitoring.","People":"General population in regions under curfew.","Owner":"Government authorities, law enforcement agencies, community leaders."}]}
